metadata.name: RemCom Service File Creation
metadata.comment: Detects default RemCom service filename which indicates RemCom service installation and execution

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\remcomsvc.exe')))

output.summary: Detects default RemCom service filename which indicates RemCom service installation and execution
